titles.title: To provide for the transfer of the Naval Hospital located at the Orlando Naval Training Center, Florida, to the Department of Veterans Affairs for use as an expanded ambulatory care center, a nursing home complex, and a facility for related medical purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities.
Executive Comment Requested from Navy, Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/21/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Navy to transfer the Orlando Naval Hospital in Orlando, Florida, to the Department of Veterans Affairs for use as an expanded ambulatory care center, nursing home complex, and a facility for related medical purposes. Requires such transfer within one month after the Naval Hospital is closed.
